titleStmt.title: The Royal Exchange Contayning sundry aphorismes of phylosophie, and golden principles of morrall and naturall quadruplicities. Vnder pleasant and effectuall sentences, dyscouering such strange definitions, deuisions, and distinctions of vertue and vice, as may please the grauest cittizens, or youngest courtiers. Fyrst written in Italian, and dedicated to the Signorie of Venice, nowe translated into English, and offered to the cittie of London. Rob. Greene, in Artibus Magister.
Dottrina delle virtù. English
titleStmt.author: Rinaldi, Oraziofin id s105920/upd.
Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Charlewood for William VVright,

notesStmt.note: A translation, with added commentary, of: Rinaldi, Orazio. Dottrina delle virtù.
Running title reads: The royall exchange.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
